Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 71st/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, South Chicago, Ellis and 71st: due to, street blockage near 71st/Cottage Grove .

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
